name: Abberation Snake
description:
Abberation Snake? Just another snake game? Noooooo! This one has a huge twist! Everytime you get stuck, time resets, and a fresh new clone walks out the other end! Try to get as many coins as possible! Avoid Tight Corners! You are your own enemy here!

You control a little snake, coming out of a portal. Your goal is to get as many coins as possible! Pretty easy, huh? No! If you get stuck, the game does'nt end! You just respawn at a different place, but at the same time! Now there are you're past selfes, stealing your precious coins! What High Score can you achieve?

Controls W / UP -> move up A / LEFT -> move left S / DOWN -> move down D / RIGHT -> move right

This is my game was made for the Weekly Game #150, it is also my first game. Please let me know if you like it!
